visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type: line, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#00008B) for the title and axis labels, with a font size of 14px. Data series: The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, with the name 'Temperature'. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B) for the line. Additional configurations: Set the chart margins to [50, 50, 50, 50], add a light gray background (#F0F0F0), and include a legend at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart displaying monthly average temperatures for a year. The chart type is set to 'line', and the title is 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The axes and labels are styled with a dark blue color (#00008B) and a font size of 14px. The data series includes monthly temperature data with the name 'Temperature'. The line color is customized with a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B). Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to [50, 50, 50, 50], adding a light gray background (#F0F0F0), and positioning the legend at the bottom of the chart.
